name: skipper-azure
description: A Skipper adapter for Microsoft Azure storage.

scripts.test: node -e "require('skipper-adapter-tests')({mocha: { timeout: 360000 }, module: require('./'), container:process.env.CONTAINER || 'skipper-adapter-tests', key: process.env.KEY, secret: process.env.SECRET});"

author: Lukas Reichart
